title: How and where to get my electronic idea manufactured? What would be the approx cost range? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sorry I dont have a name for you but you can research some companies in china. What you`ll need to do is maybe attend a few trade shows and discuss with people what exactly it is that you need. For a list of Industry specific trade events you can check out Events, Global Trade Shows, All Conferences, Upcoming Fairs & Seminars, Popular Workshops & Summits, Business Event Venues All the Best !!
